name: Yonah Aviv
headline: Senior Student at TanenbaumCHAT, Coding Tutor, Co-founder of Habit Cash
summary: I am a senior high school student, and I am very passionate about computer science and technology. Specific interests of mine include Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing, Web Development, Modern Physics, and Mathematics. Aside from being in school, I recently co-founded a startup and I currently work there as a software developer. On the topic of software development, I am also a coding tutor and developer bootcamp instructor for School Simplified.

projects.title: Svelte Portfolio with GitHub API
projects.description: Quick and simple svelte portfolio web app that automatically fetches your github repos and displays them as projects in a responsive grid. Made for a workshop I hosted.

projects.title: Flask Svelte Heroku demo
projects.description: Flask with Single Page Application frontend, with heroku deployment made easy(no docker)

projects.title: Client Portfolio Website
projects.description: portfolio website coded by Yonah Aviv for Harry James potter.

projects.title: Dystopian Literature Blog
projects.description: Blog on various dystopian texts for the final summative task in my grade 11 English class

projects.title: Pydash
projects.description: Python implementation of Geometry dash, a rhythm based platformer game, using Pygame, an interactive graphics library for python. Made for a computer science course

projects.title: FragmentQR
projects.description: Browser extension that allows for the generation of QR codes linking to arbitrary text on a page.
